Lyric:
[by:无小云_]
[ti:]
[ar:F.I.R]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]

[00:00.64]Sway 
[00:13.77]When marimba rhythms start to play
[00:17.74]Dance with me, make me sway
[00:22.09]Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
[00:25.78]Hold me close, sway me more
[00:30.40]Like a flower bending in the breeze
[00:33.94]Bend with me, sway with ease
[00:37.99]When we dance you have a way with me
[00:41.60]Stay with me, sway with me
[00:45.94]Other dancers may be on the floor
[00:50.16]Dear, but my eyes will see only you
[00:54.12]Only you have the magic technique
[00:58.53]When we sway I go weak
[01:02.79]I can hear the sounds of violins
[01:06.40]Long before it begins
[01:10.83]Make me thrill as only you know how
[01:14.32]Sway me smooth, sway me now
[01:51.15]Other dancers may be on the floor
[01:55.23]Dear, but my eyes will see only you
[01:59.02]Only you have the magic technique
[02:03.07]When we sway I go weak
[02:07.43]I can hear the sounds of violins
[02:10.90]Long before it begins
[02:15.29]Make me thrill as only you know how
[02:18.87]Sway me smooth, sway me now
[02:24.96]You know how,sway me smooth
[02:28.62]Sway me now
